content: i scream blankie 1 more row designs erica jackofsky featured yarn lion brand ice cream 394 yards 100 grams cyc #3 100% acrylic color bunny tracks 2 balls hook h-8 5mm gauge approx 16 sts & 16 row = 4 in pattern *gauge is not critial but will affect yardage used notions tapestry needle finished size approx 29 x 29 notes this crocheted blankie is worked corner to corner first increasing and then decreasing this version is made with a cyc#3 yarn however you can easily swap yarns and work until you reach the widest point or halfway through your yarn and then begin decreasing easy peasy i scream blankie page 1 @1morerowdesigns this pattern is intended for personal use only do not redistribute without written consent of designer the pattern abbreviations chain chain decrease decrease increases half_double_crochet half_double_crochet chain 3 repeat repeat single_crochet single_crochet row 1 single_crochet in 3rd chain from hook turn sc2 3 decrease single_crochet 2 3 together space space decrease together row 2 chain 3 counts as 1st single_crochet and chain 1 here and throughout skip next st single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in chain 3 space turn stitch guide hdc2tog - half_double_crochet 2 together row 3 chain 3 skip first st single_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 yarn over insert hook into next st and pull up a loop skip next st single_crochet ch1 single_crochet in chain 3 space turn twice yarn over and pull through all loops on hook 1 st decrease row 4-81 chain 3 skip first st *single_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 skip next st* repeat * to * across to last chain 3 decrease - single_crochet 2 together space work single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in chain 3 space turn insert hook into next st and pull up a loop twice yarn over and pull through all loops on hook - 1 st decrease decreases row 82 chain 1 hdc2tog chain 1 *single_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 skip next st* repeat to last single_crochet in row single_crochet in last space half_double_crochet in the chain 3 space turn decrease row chain 1 decrease in first 2 sts *single_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 skip next st* repeat to last chain space single_crochet in last space in last 2 sts work decrease turn continue working decrease row until 5 sts remain next row chain 1 decrease single_crochet in next chain space decrease turn last row chain 1 sc3tog fasten_off border optional chain 1 work 3 single_crochet in corner st work 1 single_crochet in the side edge of each row or evenly spaced as works with your gauge work 3 single_crochet in each corner stitch continue until you reach the first corner and join with a slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in ends tag your projects on instagram with i scream blankie #1morerowdesigns simply addicting patterns for the modern maker design copyright erica jackofsky all rights reserved july 2023 for more information contact 1morerowdesigns@gmail com show off
